attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should legislate to set-up a body to over-see the fair pricing of petrol and diesel. A body with the power to regulate fuel prices at the forecourt in the interests of the customer, who at the moment is being heavily overcharged.

rejection.details:
There is a similar existing petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Fuel1PoundAgain/

Petition titles should also be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
